title: Enterprise License Manager
description: Views and manages licenses for your domain.

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/apps.lic: View and manage G Suite licenses for your domain

skuId.description: Id of the sku of the product.

skuName.description: Display Name of the sku of the product.
